appointment_page.bottleneck: Static import of 'OpenAIAgentsBooking' (and its internal 'useStatsigEvents') into the Server Component page caused unnecessary JS in the initial bundle. Although the build output size didn't drop dramatically (likely due to shared chunking or the component being small), the TBT/INP benefit comes from deferring the hydration of this interactive widget.
appointment_page.optimization: Converted 'OpenAIAgentsBooking' to a dynamic import with `ssr: false` via a client wrapper. Added a visual skeleton to prevent CLS.

changes.change: Implemented dynamic import with ssr:false and loading skeleton.
changes.impact: Reduces main thread work during hydration (INP/TBT) by deferring the AI Agent logic until after initial paint.

verification.manual_check: Visit /appointments. Observe the skeleton loader briefly before the AI Agent appears. Verify no layout shift occurs.
